fulltext:
EXPERIENCES 
ASSISTANT BRAND MANAGER                                            Jul 2017 – Jul 2018 
LG VINA COSMETIC  
Fully in charge of luxury cosmetic brand “O HUI” tasks including:  
 
Work closely with sales department (Direct Sales, Store Sales, Sale Online, 
Sales Planning, etc.) to increase sales index.  
 
Research competitors monthly 
 
Visit market to analyze brand issues and understand industry trends 
 
Prepare and analyze reports: sales performance, campaign performance, etc.  
 
Execute marketing activities including launching events, activations, 
promotions, etc.  
 
Fully in charged digital channel of brands: facebook, e-commerce, 
advertising, etc.  
 
Permanently collaborate with factory for import and export of products, 
stock management, quality control, etc.  
 
Make sure product will be standardized with Quality Control team and 
Supply Chain Management team  
 
Co-ordinate with Korea Marketing team to prepare imported documents and 
promoted plan to develop O HUI in Vietnam Market.  
 
Manage agencies for brands’ campaigns.  
MARKETING RESEARCH ASSOCIATE                              Oct 2015 – Jul 2017  
KANTAR MILLWARD BROWN VIETNAM 
Managing and shaping a research project from start to finish with guidance from 
managers (mostly involving FMCG clients such as Nestle, Pepsi, Unilever, etc.), task 
including:  
 
Work with CMI/brand teams to explore & clarify business backgrounds, 
needs & objectives  
 
Contribute ideas for research design and analytic approach to solve problems 
and write proposals  
 
Develop questionnaires and field surveys to collect consumer data  
 
Collect, interpret and communicate market information/insights especially 
for branding, advertising, develping products  
 
Write reports that include effective summaries, narratives & demonstrations 
(tables, graphs, etc.) 
 
Conduct market research as needed, including but not limited to Brand 
Positioning, Advertising Research, Attitude & Usage, Packaging & Label 
Research, Product Usage/claims Tests, etc.  
Key achievements:  
 
Samsung – maximisise displaying ads, POSM in-store nationwide 
 
Friesland Campina -  “Cô Gái Hà Lan, Active 20+ TVC” – brainstorming 
and evaluate idea direction, TVC testing for succesfull communication 
 
Coke – “Coffee Cocacola” – Understanding Consumers Usage and Attitudes 
Concept evaluati
Taste testi
 to launch new pr
cts
LÃ THỊ NGỌC TRÂM 
Address: 68, No.3 Street, Binh 
Hung Hoa A, Binh Tan District, 
HCMC 
Phone: 0938 11 5653 
Email: Tram.latn@gmail.com 
ABOUT ME 
Energetic, dedicated 
employee with strong 
inquiring mind, 
interpersonal, and problem 
solving skills 
Strong understanding about 
commercial activities in 
FMCG industry 
Good team player, who well 
adapt to high pressure 
working environment to 
deliver team goals 
 
 
 
EDUCATION 
BACHELOR OF 
COMMERCE MARKETING 
RMIT University  
 
Top 15% student in 2015 - 
Graduate with flying colors 
THANK YOU

experiences.detail:
Fully in charge of luxury cosmetic brand “O HUI” tasks including:
Work closely with sales department (Direct Sales, Store Sales, Sale Online, Sales Planning, etc.) to increase sales index.
Research competitors monthly
Visit market to analyze brand issues and understand industry trends
Prepare and analyze reports: sales performance, campaign performance, etc.
Execute marketing activities including launching events, activations, promotions, etc.
Fully in charged digital channel of brands: facebook, e-commerce, advertising, etc.
Permanently collaborate with factory for import and export of products, stock management, quality control, etc.
Make sure product will be standardized with Quality Control team and
Supply Chain Management team
Co-ordinate with Korea Marketing team to prepare imported documents and promoted plan to develop O HUI in Vietnam Market. Manage agencies for brands’ campaigns.

Managing and shaping a research project from start to finish with guidance from managers (mostly involving FMCG clients such as Nestle, Pepsi, Unilever, etc.), task including:
Work with CMI/brand teams to explore & clarify business backgrounds, needs & objectives
Contribute ideas for research design and analytic approach to solve problems and write proposals
Develop questionnaires and field surveys to collect consumer data
Collect, interpret and communicate market information/insights especially for branding, advertising, develping products
Write reports that include effective summaries, narratives & demonstrations (tables, graphs, etc.)
Conduct market research as needed, including but not limited to Brand Positioning, Advertising Research, Attitude & Usage, Packaging & Label Research, Product Usage/claims Tests, etc.
Key achievements:
Samsung - maximisise displaying ads, POSM in-store nationwide
Friesland Campina - “Cô Gái Hà Lan, Active 20+ TVC” - brainstorming and evaluate idea direction, TVC testing for succesfull communication
